resources.string: Here orderly means increasing order
Tap the number in the order 1 2 3 4
Except february, does any month have 28 days
All 12 months have 28 days, mark your answer 12
Visualise the currency sharply
3 is the smallest number

Select two numbers whose sum is asked
Do addition operation between numbers
nth number=(n-1)th number + sum of 1st to (n-1)th number
Revise properties of prime and non prime numbers
Except 51 every number is a prime number
Do operations addition and subtraction among the numbers
Differentiate number and word
2 is the number else are words representing number
See the question keenly
Do the displayed operation asap and dont forget the question
The digits lie between 0 and 5
123 is such a number which makes you smart

• The player can enhance his knowldge via this KHOYAPAYA.

• Play option will redirect you to the options where two different aspects of the KhoyaPaya exists.

•Player can play only Part1 initially and Part2 is lock.

•After crossing the five different levels of Part1, user is allowed to play Part2.

•The three lives are provided in the game.

•Each live is of 30 seconds.

•Player is provided initially with 10 coins so that if he wish he can view clue and solution.

•After loosing 3 lives, the game will stop till the lives come back.

•The lives come backafter 30 minutes.

•Hope the player will enjoy the game.
Level Sound
